TopicTitle: Since when is it possible to quicksave/quickload in atmo?

Articles.Content:
I remember some time ago Devs saying "its not possible to quicksave/quickload in the atmo", but suddenly I browse forums and see someone saying something about quickooading with chutes open. So I go launch the game, take my fav airplane, take off and F5-F9 and BAM! I travelled back in time in the atmosphere!

Maybe I wasnt paying attention to dev notes, or something but also remember the times when it wasnt possible until landed.
It was added in either this version or the last iirc

I think last version.

Pritty sure it was in the patch notes to
I must've missed it then. To me its a pretty major addition to the game.

Be careful with it, Veeltch; it's still a work-in-progress. Some things, such as parachutes, do not always restore to the proper state, which can cause fatal crashes. Personally, I do not use this function in its current state.
Sure thing. Wasnt going to use it for unpowered landing anyway. But for someone who builds a lot of planes (like me) and flies many at the same time I find this to be a very useful feature.
Since 0.24 I think, or maybe 0.25. In any case I've never had any trouble from it, but I advise against quicksaving right before crashing
